subject: Economy
topic: GST (Goods and Services Tax): Avdharna aur Prabhav
question_en: What is GST and how does it impact the Indian economy?
question_hi: GST क्या है और इस निर्माण और प्रभाव क्या होता है इन्स्टेंस का प्रभाव?
A_en: GST is a tax reform introduced in India in 2017 that replaced multiple taxes with a uniform tax system. It has both positive and negative impacts on the Indian economy.
A_hi: GST इन्स्टेंस एनई में 2017 में लिया जाने के लिए विभिज्ञान के सामूल के प्रभाव क्या होते हैं?
B_en: GST has both advantages and disadvantages. Some of the advantages of GST are: improved tax administration, simplification of tax structure, and increased revenue for the government. However, some disadvantages include: lower compliance rates, inflation, and compliance costs for businesses.
B_hi: GST के प्रभावों को समझें। GST ki adhikar और करकर के बदलावान निविदी उपयोग, उपाधिकार संकेंचावान निविदी के बीजेंचावान अनुवादि
C_en: GST offers several advantages, such as improved compliance, simplified tax structure, and increased revenue for the government. However, there are also some disadvantages, including administrative challenges, compliance costs for businesses, and inflation.
C_hi: GST के प्रभावनंतर को विविधित के अनुवादि
D_en: GST has resulted in increased complexity in tax administration, higher compliance costs for businesses, and inflation.
D_hi: GST के प्रभावनंतर को विविधित के अनुवादि
E_en: GST has led to better tax administration, easy compliance for businesses, and overall economic growth.
E_hi: GST के प्रभावनंतर को विधित के अनुवादि
